subject: Football
lead_paragraph: As bad as the Giants’ collapse and ill-conceived decision-making appeared at the close of the team’s 27-26 loss to the Cowboys, it became considerably more baffling and implausibly tortuous Monday.
snippet: As bad as the Giants’ collapse and ill-conceived decision-making appeared at the close of the team’s 27-26 loss to the Cowboys, it became considerably more baffling and implausibly tortuous Monday.
